feed.title: RecipeSage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.13.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: limit connection pool to 5 in ci by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1288
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1289
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1290
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1291
  • fix: trim label title length to 255 when importing recipe data by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1296
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.13.5...v2.13.6

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: sign in with google by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1295
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1297
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1298
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1302
  • fix: do not throw error when fetching preferences with invalid session by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1303
  • test: unit tests on recipes by @UlianaPurtova in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1278
  • feat: display a disruptive error when critical errors occur by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1285
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1306
  • chore: setup typesafe express by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1300
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1307
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1304
  • chore: update to 3.5-turbo-0125 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1309
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1308
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1310
  • feat: recipe keeper import format by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1314
  • chore: kube tweaks by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1315
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1316
  • fix: search service ref by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1317
  • fix: show password eye, convert auth fields to ion-input by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1301
  • fix: ingredients column sizing by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1318
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1319
  • chore: update to Angular 17 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1286
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1322
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1324
  • feat: filter by label on shared collections by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1325
  • fix: select last used shopping list/meal plan rather than first by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1326
  • fix: ml sometimes translating imported text by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1327
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1328
  • fix: scenario where user may not be linked to subscription by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1329
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group group with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1334
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1331
  • some corrections and additions to the Ukrainian translation by @zaharchenko-yurka in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1335
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1336
  • fix: add kale to produce by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1337
  • chore: update to node20, docker24, base image by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1338
  • chore: add empty zh-cn locale file by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1339
  • feat: improve label category description by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1340
  • feat: warnings for label categories by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1341
  • feat: enable assistant for selfhost by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1342
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1343
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1344
  • feat: add zh-cn option, fix lang change not updating sidemenu by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1345
  • Add or as separator by @Boushi in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1347
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1346
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1350
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1351
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1352
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1353
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1354
  • chore(deps-dev): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1355
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1356
  • Fix/firebase store location by @levyitay in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1358
  • fix: incorrect ical dates produced dependent on user timezone by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1361
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1364
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1359
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1365
  • [test] update the recipe by @UlianaPurtova in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1362
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1379

New Contributors

  • @Boushi made their first contribution in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.13.7...v2.14.0

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update nx to 18 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1366
  • chore: update to nx 19 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1385
